action_description: This Action will turn your lights off if they are on, and turn them on if they are off.
This Action will make your lights slowly breathe the color of your choice.
Turn off the Clean Cycle of your LIFX Clean
This Action will make your lights quickly blink the color of your choice.
This Action will make your LIXF Z lights move in a pattern.
This Action will turn your lights on.
This Action will activate a Scene.
Turn on the Clean Cycle of your LIFX Clean to it's default duration
This Action will turn your lights off.
This Action will change the color of your lights.
